summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all hyper‑parameters and runtime options required to train an AlignProp model, including experiment naming, logging/tracking, checkpoint management, precision settings, optimizer details, sampling behavior, and advanced training tricks such as truncated back‑propagation and negative prompts.
business_intent: Provide a single, parsable object that lets developers launch reproducible AlignProp training jobs with minimal boilerplate, supporting experiment tracking, resource‑efficient training, and easy integration with Hugging Face’s Accelerate and logging services.
